title: Don't Give Up
requirements: Recover from Panicked.
effect: You need +1 Distress to get Panicked or Hopeless.

title: Bring the Pain
requirements: Recover from Unconscious.
effect: You need +1 Injury to get Unconscious.

title: Fearless
requirements: Defend from a Distress while Panicked.
effect: You are always Panicked, but you get Hindered instead of Hopeless.

title: Pummel
requirements: Knock out an opponent unarmed.
effect: Playing a Partial Success to attack an opponent while unarmed inflicts +1 Injury.

title: Flex
requirements: Impress or intimidate someone with your body.
effect: +1 Effect when using your body to impress or intimidate.

title: Oversized Weaponry
requirements: Hit something with a weapon too large to wield easily.
effect: You can use oversized weapons. You can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.

title: Offensive Throw
requirements: Throw something most people cannot throw.
effect: You can throw characters of your size or smaller up to 1 zone away.

title: Power Attack
requirements: Strike an enemy so hard they stagger or fall.
effect: Your melee attacks leave enemies open—they receive a Complication.

title: War Cry
requirements: Intimidate multiple opponents at once.
effect: Play Success to intimidate all enemies in your zone, giving them 1 Distress.

title: Grapple
requirements: Restrain an enemy in close combat.
effect: When you successfully block a melee attack, you automatically grapple the attacker.

title: Choke Out
requirements: Hold an opponent down until they submit or pass out.
effect: If you grapple an enemy for 2 consecutive turns, they lose consciousness.

title: Smash
requirements: Knock down 3 or more opponents with a single melee attack.
effect: You can split you melee attack Effect between enemies in the same zone.

title: Seductive
requirements: Seduce someone.
effect: Receive 2x Boosts at the start of a social Encounter with a character that may find you attractive.

title: Elusive
requirements: Retreat from a zone where you received an Injury.
effect: Once per round, you can move to an adjacent zone when you defend from taking any Injury.

title: Ghost Step
requirements: Sneak past an enemy without being detected.
effect: +1 Effect while moving silently.

title: Master of Disguise
requirements: Deceive someone by assuming a false identity.
effect: +1 Effect when you assume a false identity.

title: Venomous
requirements: Poison someone.
effect: You can apply poison to a weapon and attack with it in 1 action. You don't poison yourself by mistake.

title: Forger
requirements: Deceive someone with a forged evidence.
effect: +1 Effect when manipulating with forged documents. The documents always hold up under casual inspection.

title: Stalker
requirements: Knock-out or assassinate    an unaware target in 1 action.
effect: Your attacks deal +1 Injury or Distress to unaware enemies.

title: Safecracker
requirements: Break a lock.
effect: +1 Effect when braking into or out of locked places or containers.

title: Pickpocket
requirements: Steal an item from a person without them noticing.
effect: When you play a Success or better to pickpocket someone, you get an extra asset.

title: Staged Accident
requirements: Kill or knock-out someone indirectly.
effect: +1 Effect when hurting someone indirectly.

title: Hidden Arsenal
requirements: Smuggle a weapon somewhere.
effect: Once per scene, reveal a hidden weapon to attack with +2 Effect.

title: Rallying Call
requirements: Boost an ally.
effect: Play a Success to allow all allies that can hear you to discard a Complication or receive a Boost.

title: Forager
requirements: Forage some food.
effect: You get 2x the food when foraging.

title: Tracker
requirements: Find someone you are tracking.
effect: +1 Effect while tracking.

title: Camouflage
requirements: Camouflaging yourself from an enemy for 3 rounds.
effect: Your camouflage always holds up unless inspected.

title: Hunter
requirements: Knock-out or kill an enemy with one shot.
effect: Hitting an enemy without an Injury inflicts +1 Injury.

title: Animal Trainer
requirements: Make an animal follow your command.
effect: Play a Special Action to teach your pet a new trick.

title: Trapper
requirements: Make a trap and capture an enemy or an animal in it.
effect: Your traps don't hurt you or your allies.

title: Marksman
requirements: Hit a target 3 zones away.
effect: You can shoot ranged weapons 1 zone further.

title: Weapon Maintenance
requirements: Repair a broken weapon.
effect: Weapons never break or jam when you use them.

title: Penetration
requirements: Hurt two enemies with one shot.
effect: You can apply extra ranged Injury left after defeating an enemy to another enemy in the same zone.

title: Survivor
requirements: Survive a natural hazard without consequences.
effect: You get +1 Effect when dealing with natural hazards.

title: Animal Friend
requirements: Calm down an aggressive animal.
effect: +1 Effect when handling animals.

title: Strategist
requirements: Reach a +4 Effect on your action.
effect: Your Outcome card hand limit is increased by 1.

title: Volatile Mastery
requirements: Blow something up.
effect: You never hit yourself with your own explosives.

title: Linguist
requirements: Gain a clue by studying a text document.
effect: +1 Effect when decoding or translating. You can always recognize a language by text or speech.

title: Historian
requirements: Recall or uncover a historical event.
effect: You always know 1 useful fact about any historical site, artifact, or tradition relevant to your setting.

title: Botanist
requirements: Identify a rare or useful plant in the wild.
effect: You automatically recognize common plants. You receive +1 Effect when using plants for medicine, poison, or alchemy.

title: Chemist
requirements: Create an effective potion, poison, or explosive compound.
effect: Chemicals you craft have +1 Effect or +1 round duration.

title: Tinkerer
requirements: Repair or modify a device to serve an unintended purpose.
effect: You don't need specialized tools when repairing or crafting.

title: Physician
requirements: Treat a diseased person.
effect: +1 Effect when treating Injuries and diseases outside battle.

title: Inventor
requirements: Design and build a completely new tool or device.
effect: Play a Special Action to invent a gadget tailored to the current situation. Destroy a non-consumable item for a +1 Effect.

title: Academic
requirements: Teach an ally a new skill.
effect: Play Partial Success to give an ally a Boost and discard a Complication.

title: Powerful Rhetoric
requirements: Make a speech.
effect: Playing a Partial Success when persuading or debating counts as a Success.

title: Medic
requirements: Revive a fallen ally.
effect: +1 Effect when treating Injuries in battle.

title: Foresight
requirements: Fortell something.
effect: Receive a clue from the Storyteller in exchange for 2x Distress.

title: Sense Danger
requirements: Detect an unseen threat before it strikes.
effect: You receive +1 Effect when trying to notice ambushes, traps, or hidden dangers.

title: Read Emotions
requirements: Call out a liar.
effect: Play a Success to detect underlying emotions of a character.

title: Mark an Omen
requirements: Act on a superstition.
effect: Play a Success to make all enemies in the same zone gain 1 Distress.

title: Genus Loci
requirements: Connect with a place or object's lingering essence.
effect: Play a Success to glimpse into an object or location’s past and learn a hidden truth.

title: Guide Emotions
requirements: Talk someone down from attacking you.
effect: +1 Effect when trying to calm someone down.

title: Crowd Control
requirements: Sway a crowd to obey you.
effect: Play a Special Action to control command a crowd, calming, riling up, or directing them.

title: Bless
requirements: Bless someone.
effect: Once per scene, play a Success to remove a status card other than Injury from an ally.

title: Circle of Protection
requirements: Create a protective boundary.
effect: Once per session, play a Success to shield yourself and allies in your zone from the next hostile action.

title: Tactician
requirements: Execute a named tactic.
effect: Once per scene, play a Success to prevent your ally in the same zone from receiving any cards until your next turn.

title: Last Stand
requirements: Defeat an enemy while one Injury away from being Unconscious.
effect: Receive 1 less negative Effect card but at least 1 when you already have at least 5.

title: Kleptomaniac
requirements: Steal something you don't need.
effect: When stealing or looting, play up to 3 cards from your Outcome deck. Get an extra Asset for Success, Distress for Fumble and Injury for Chaos.

title: Hardened Skin
requirements: Receive 3 Injury from one attack and remain standing.
effect: Unarmed attacks against you deal -1 Injury.

title: Enter Trance
requirements: Experience a trance like state.
effect: Play a Success to fall into a trance and ignore a mental or environmental hazard or charm someone to stun them for a round.

title: Sweet Lies
requirements: Manipulate someone into trusting you with false information.
effect: Partial Success does not raise suspicion when deceiving someone.

title: Escapist
requirements: Lose enemies chasing you.
effect: +1 Effect when escaping enemies without leaving a trace.

title: Vibe
requirements: Make a friend.
effect: You receive +1 Effect when making a first impression or making someone like you.

title: Hex
requirements: Curse someone.
effect: Once per scene, play Success to make a person believe you cursed them. They receive 2x Distress. Usable once per scene.

title: Protector
requirements: Take a hit for someone else.
effect: Play an Outcome card to defend someone in your zone. You receive any unblocked Injuries.

title: Forward Assault
requirements: Make all your allies assault a zone in one turn.
effect: Designate a zone. +1 Effect to everyone who moves into that zone and attacks during the next turn.

title: Cover Fire
requirements: Intimidate a group of enemies with your firepower.
effect: Once per scene, play a Success to inflict -1 Effect on all enemies' attacks in the zone until your next turn.

title: Evasive Maneuver
effect: +1 Effect on driving, riding, or piloting to avoid something.

title: Charge
requirements: Defeat an enemy in melee right after entering a zone.
effect: +1 Effect on melee attacking after moving to a zone.

title: Ballistic
requirements: Defeat an enemy with a ranged attack without a line of sight.
effect: +1 Effect on shooting two or more zones away.

title: Acrobatic
effect: You can combine the Effect of 2 Outcome cards to overcome a movement-based challenge.

title: Calm Under Pressure
effect: Needs rework: Gain Boost every time you get Distress. You no longer get the benefit of this effect once you lose a Distress until the end of the Encounter.

title: Rage
effect: Once per encounter, you can explode with rage and get as many Boosts as you have Distresses. You lose all Boosts, if you lose a Distress and at the end of the Encounter.

title: Reckless Attack
requirements: Receive an Injury during your attack.
effect: Gain a Complication to add +1 Effect to your melee attack.

title: Brush It Off
effect: Every time you receive an Injury and don't have any Complications, you can choose to receive a Complication instead.

title: Joker
effect: Any time you receive a Distress and you don't have any Complications you can choose to receive a Complication instead.

title: Ghost
effect: You can choose to receive a Distress for a +2 Effect when trying to avoid detection.

title: All In
effect: You can choose to play up to 3 Outcome cards from your hand for combined Effect. You cannot play a Fumble or Chaos this way. Don't draw any Outcome cards at the end of your turn.

title: Burglar
effect: You can choose to receive a Distress for a +2 Effect when trying to break into something.

title: Tactical
effect: At the beginning of a combat Encounter, draw two extra Outcome cards. Only draw Outcome cards when you have fewer cards in hand than your hand limit.

title: Analytical
effect: At the beginning of an expertise-based Encounter, draw two extra Outcome cards. Only draw Outcome cards when you have fewer cards in hand than your hand limit.

title: Sympathetic
effect: At the beginning of a social Encounter, draw two extra Outcome cards. Only draw Outcome cards when you have fewer cards in hand than your hand limit.

title: Intuitive
effect: At the beginning of an Encounter, you can look at the top 3 cards of your Outcome deck, discard one and put the rest back in any order.

title: Assassin
effect: +2 Effect when you attack someone who is not aware of you.

title: Ruthless
effect: When you finish an enemy, you can choose to give all other enemies in the zone that can see you a Distress or Injury.

title: Elemental
effect: +1 Effect on Success when you use an element you are proficient in. You receive an extra Distress card when damaged by an opposite element.

title: Time Stop
requirements: Fulfill a Counter with your action.
effect: Receive a Distress to prevent a turn or round Counter from advancing.

title: Reckless Driving
effect: +1 Effect on driving, riding, or piloting to cause damage.

title: Burst fire
requirements: Requires a repeat-fire weapon.
effect: You can hit a number of targets in a zone equal to your Effect +1 for 1 Effect each.

title: White Hat Hacker
effect: +1 Effect when hacking for altruistic reasons.

title: Sharpshooter
requirements: Requires a ranged or thrown weapon.
effect: +1 Effect on shooting or throwing at an inanimate object.

title: Overclock
effect: Gain a Burning and draw an extra Outcome card to your hand.

title: Psychonaut
effect: You can ignore one effect of any bio-chemical consumable or increase its Effect by 1.

title: Charged attack
requirements: Requires a charge weapon.
effect: You can play an Outcome card from the deck each turn to add its Effect to your next attack. Fumble cancels previous Effect.

title: Upload
requirements: Requires a synthetic body.
effect: You can upload your consciousness into a different powered down machine.

title: Deploy a turret
effect: Deploy a small turret in your Zone. Play an outcome card. For that many turns the turret can attack up to 1 zone away with 1 Effect during your turn.

title: Heat Sink
requirements: Requires a synthetic body.
effect: Action: touch two allies (or self) in your zone and discard any pairs of Heat and Freezing cards.
